mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schools( id, area_uuid, uuid, name, status, created_time, modified_time, type, car_flag, yunke_flag, yunke_code ) VALUES ( #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{areaUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifiedTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carFlag, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{yunkeFlag, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{yunkeCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM schools WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}

DELETE FROM schools WHERE id in
#{item, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id id, a.area_uuid areaUuid, a.uuid uuid, a.name name, a.status status, DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createdTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.modified_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') modifiedTime, a.type type, a.car_flag carFlag, a.yunke_flag yunkeFlag, a.yunke_code yunkeCode FROM schools a WHERE a.id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT a.id id, a.area_uuid areaUuid, a.uuid uuid, a.name name, a.status status, DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createdTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.modified_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') modifiedTime, a.type type, a.car_flag carFlag, a.yunke_flag yunkeFlag, a.yunke_code yunkeCode FROM schools a WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY a.id ASC
SELECT count(*) FROM schools a WHERE 1=1
